Combined towers

Note: The towers are displayed based on fan-provided order. Hence, updates may break temporarily (until manual update) the order. To solve this problem, unordered towers are displayed at the bottom in the Others section. The Other section also includes experimental towers not necessarily available in-game (Currently there is a super emerald golem for example)

Silver

Code English Initials
gemtd_baiyin Silver S
Attack Damage Attack Rate Attack Range Projectile Speed
25 0.9 600 3000
Ability Code Ability English Tooltip English
tower_slow2 slow 2 Decrease enemy's movement speed by 90.

gemtd_b1 gemtd_y1 gemtd_d1
